TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckedListBox/CheckedItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 封装 控件中选中项（包括处于不确定状态的项）的集合。

span.span: Encapsulates the collection of checked items, including items in an indeterminate state, in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已选中的项集合是中的所有项的子集控件; 它仅包含这些项处于选中或不确定状态。The checked items collection is a subset of all items in the control; it contains only those items that are in a checked or indeterminate state. 下表是控件 （包含在控件中的所有项） 中的项的索引集合的示例。The following table is an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control). |索引Index|项Item|检查状态Check State| |-----------|----------|-----------------| |00|object 1object 1|| |11|对象 2object 2|| |22|对象 3object 3|| |33|对象 4object 4|| |44|对象 5object 5|| 根据前面的示例下, 表显示已选中项的索引的集合。Based on the previous example, the following table shows the indexed collection of the checked items. |索引Index|项Item| |-----------|----------| |00|对象 2object 2| |11|对象 4object 4| |22|对象 5object 5| 类具有两个成员，可用于访问存储的索引，属性和方法。The class has two members that allow you to access the stored indexes, the property and the method. 在前面的示例中，调用基于参数值为 1 的属性返回 4 的对象。Based on the previous example, a call to the property with a parameter value of 1 returns object 4. 调用4 与对象的参数返回的值为 1。A call to with a parameter of object 4 returns a value of 1. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举中的已选中的项若要查看内容检查项的状态处于。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 该示例演示如何使用方法来设置项的复选状态。The example demonstrates using the method to set the check state of an item. 该示例还演示了如何使用属性来获取，和属性来获取。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 第一个循环使用方法以获取的每个选中的项，给定项的索引。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二个循环也使用，但使用方法来检索项的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法确定是否将对象从集合处于集合。This method determines if an object from the collection is in the collection.

summary.span: 将整个集合复制到现有数组中，从该数组内的指定位置开始复制。

span.span: Copies the entire collection into an existing array at a specified location within the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于合并到单个阵列中的多个集合中所选的索引。You can use this method to combine the selected indexes from multiple collections into a single array.

summary.span: 返回选中项集合中的一个索引。

span.span: Returns an index into the collection of checked items.

returns.span: 该对象在选中项集合中的索引，或者，如果该对象不在该集合中，则为 -1。

span.span: The index of the object in the checked item collection or -1 if the object is not in the collection.

returns.span: 有关更多信息，请参见 类概述中的示例。

span.span: For more information, see the examples in the class overview.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合是中的对象的子集表示选中的项的集合。The collection is a subset of the objects in the collection, representing only items that are checked. 此集合是按升序排序。This collection is ordered in ascending order.
